name: Steam Charts - Simple
description:
Steam Charts is a really well built site, so there wasn't much to change.
But here are some changes to make the site some what more "usable".

user.name: Gibbu
user.about: About me: I like to mostly create dark themes to make it easier for your eyes, but I do like to change it up from time to time. I also like to try and make my themes customizable, so you can change the look and feels of the theme. Social stuff: My Website My YouTube My Twitter My Twitch
